A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Rian Johnson delivers some great moments in Star Wars The Last Jedi. However\, many of his decisions hardly pay off and are often treated as plot points that end up being wasted potential. I do not by any means dislike this film to the extent that many fans are going to\, I do however feel very empty and disappointed after seeing this film and was expected something more impactful. Upon a second viewing I do hope to change my opinion\, but as of right now this is one of my least favorite Star Wars films.
